intro.text: 100 Coaches is an organization that offers services and opportunities to inspire, develop, and energize leaders for the future. We amplify the collective impact of our exclusive community to improve the world.

coaches.headline: Our Members
coaches.text: Members of 100 Coaches are an elite group of leaders, thinkers, and coaches committed to achieving positive lasting change.

consultancy.headline: Work With Us
consultancy.text: Selected by Marshall Goldsmith, 100 Coaches offers a collection of the best executive coaches in the world. We help successful leaders reach their full potential using a variety of coaching methods.

coachList.body: This is another test of the bio section
